content.description: The writer wants sentence 20 (reproduced below) to provide commentary that reflects the complexity of the discussion in the paragraph and the passage.
content.question: You can expect to read quite a bit in college.Which of the following versions of sentence 20 most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: Consulting secondary sources stimulates critical thinking.
As you can tell, I really like to read.
Not all of my professors required the use of scholarly articles, though some made a point of suggesting ones that they themselves had written.
However, I understood that my level of engagement with these materials was not as profound as it was with primary texts such as Shakespeare’s plays.

content.answer: However, I understood that my level of engagement with these materials was not as profound as it was with primary texts such as Shakespeare’s plays.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Qualify a claim using modifiers, counterarguments, or alternative perspectives.
